name: GNTT date Time
author: Golzarrahman

sections.description: To display the date Time at the topbar of your site you have to just install the plugin. A wide range of calendar and digital clocks are shown in the link ‘http://market.mathgr.com/gntt-date-time/’
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents,
  2. Upload the folder local-time-clock to your WP plugin folder /wp-content/plugins/ directory,
  3. Go to Plugins > Plugins, and activate the plugin,
  4. To display the date Time at the top of your all pages, all posts and everywhere in your site, you have to just install the plugin.
sections.faq:
Q. Is GNTT date Time free?

Ans.Yeah, 1.0 version is free. But, for premium version should be paid.You will get option panel in the premium version

Q. Can I use multiple display?

Ans.Yeah, it will display on home page,all posts, all pages everywhere.

Q. Can I use Different width and height?

Ans.Yeah, to use different width and height you have to use premium version.Similarly you can change background-color, text-color etc.
